attributes.action: I would like all MPs to support a no deal brexit or stand down.
attributes.additional_details: Search brexit petitions on direct gov website and the one with the most signatures is one to leave the EU without a deal
attributes.background: The vote to leave the EU has been cast the people had their say its up to the government to deliver in the name of democracy nobody voted leave but lets get a deal David Cameron himself said leave meant leave.

rejection.details:
The resignation of an MP and/or Minister would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

You may like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/229963
